title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 22.2 - Types of examinations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 22.2 - Types of examinations

State Regulations

The following types of examinations to be taken and passed by each individual seeking to be a licensee or a sublicensee pursuant to section
2103
of the Insurance Law are hereby prescribed as follows: (a) Life. An examination on life insurance, annuity contracts and noncancellable disability insurance, and pertinent provisions of the Insurance Law. (b) Accident and health. An examination on accident and health insurance and pertinent provisions of the Insurance Law and the New York State Disability Benefits Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง
22.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
